text: Balo -- ''tomadera ki e-sabera ca'ite bhalo jinisera khabara deba? Yara supathe cale tadera jan'ya tadera prabhura kache rayecha baganasamuha, yadera nice diye baye yacche jharanaraji, sekhane tara thakabe cirakala, ara pabitra sangisathi, ara allahâ€Œra santasti. Ara allah bandadera paryabeksaka
